entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
